about_the_game:
In a dystopian future, humans have colonized space, and Created the biggest Empire EVER made. A few days before when the capital of the Empire moved to another planet, the milky way was attacked by the enemy.

Our Heroes left from the sector 317 and after defeating some enemies they received the mission: To save the earth.
detailed_description:
In a dystopian future, humans have colonized space, and Created the biggest Empire EVER made. A few days before when the capital of the Empire moved to another planet, the milky way was attacked by the enemy.

Our Heroes left from the sector 317 and after defeating some enemies they received the mission: To save the earth.
legal_notice: All rights reserved to João Marcos Correia.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Defender's Squad: The Last Ride Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This demo allows you to play stage 1 and 3 of the defender's squad: the last ride. You can select one of the three ship available. This demo NOT save any progress of the game.
